name: ZHILE ZHOOTER (SOULBATTERY)
description:
In a city under the control of Zombie Holocaust, mutant, toxic vegetation and warehouse mazes are the dangers to be overcome Arcadio, who seeks to save his partner collecting medical kits to prevent further infection in his broken leg. You will have to discover through their adventures and research the causes of zombification in the city using homemade weapons created by his ability.

This adventure is the chapter 4 of an epic history of horror and gore known as "Zhile: Zombie Holocaust Nuclear" which shows us a Santiago de Chile immersed into chaos and desolation caused by a nuclear fission and radioactive leak at one of its plants Uranium.

Zhile Zhooter is a 2D shooter game type in Top. Movement speed, shooting, reading and understanding of history in comics allows players to overcome without difficulty the levels and complete objectives that will keep writing the story.
